content: Hello. In which resource is it better to store a "Potentially dangerous social factor for health" (frequent change of residence, lack of housing, unsatisfactory living conditions, low income, lack of access to adequate medical care, irrational nutrition, irregular nutrition, frequent change of place of work, lack of work, the presence of harmful production factors, etc.). There may be several choices.
The Gravity project is working on this. Normally this would be an Observation, however a Condition can also be used.
